tasks.name: Define Ping Target
tasks.objective: Identify the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to determine the appropriate target for the ping operation.
Document the chosen target for future reference.
acceptance: Target is clearly defined and agreed upon by stakeholders.
risks: Incorrect target may lead to misleading results.
mitigations: Engage with multiple stakeholders to validate the target.

tasks.name: Determine Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report based on the ping operation results.
actions: Gather input from users on what they expect in the report.
Define the structure and content of the report based on user feedback.
acceptance: Report requirements are documented and approved by users.
risks: Insufficient details in the report may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on report requirements based on user feedback.

tasks.name: Plan Ping Operation and Report Generation
tasks.objective: Outline the steps to execute the ping operation and generate the report based on defined requirements.
actions: Create a detailed plan for executing the ping operation.
Draft a plan for generating the report based on the ping results.
acceptance: Plans for both ping operation and report generation are clear and actionable.

notes: This micro-iteration focuses on clarifying ambiguities regarding the ping target and report requirements before proceeding with implementation.
